author: julianfoad
msg: The example hook script 'detect-merge-conflicts.sh' was too eager to reject
a commit, since a single added line of "=======" was interpreted as a
conflict marker, and that line occurs reasonably often in normal text files.
Only look for the beginning and end marker lines, because they are more
